title: Jawans THREATENED by terrorists!!!
selftext:
Here we can see that the Indian jawans arneing threatened by kuki terrorists that they will cause harm to them and will fire at them but even tho the jawan says them to calm down and not fire because if they do they will have to crossfire for their protection and this will cause injuries and deaths for them

Why are some terrorists threatening jawans?? The Indian soldiers have put their lives in their hands and fought with our enemies many times and this is how they're treated?? Not forgivable at all!! Jawans being threatened by terrorists is the last thing I wished to see

[Source](https://twitter.com/nareshchandra_1/status/1755986619620843624?t=CzF7a6kaQmsz9O5Gn9CWiA&s=19) currently not covered by media cuz it's 12 AM and it's fresh new will be covered in the morning and I will drop the link in the comments as the body can't be edited

Thanks for ready Jai Hind, Jai Bharat
